university.name: HarvardX University
university.about: Harvard university is a private lvy league research university established in 1636,and named for its first benefactor, clergyman John Harvard.

university.name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
university.about: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) is a private land-grant research university established in 1861, the institute has since played a key role in the development of modern science, engineering, mathematics, and technology
university.address: 77 Massachusetts Ave, Cambridge, MA 02139, United States

university.name: Stanford University
university.about: Stanford University, officially Leland Stanford Junior University, is a private research university. Stanford was founded in 1885 by Leland
university.address: 450 Serra Mall, Stanford, CA 94305, United States

university.name: University of Oxford
university.about: The University of Oxford is a collegiate research university in Oxford. There is evidence of teaching as early as 1096, making it the oldest university in the English-speaking world

university.name: University of Cambridge
university.about: The University of Cambridge is a collegiate research university. Founded in 1209 and granted a royal charter by Henry III in 1231.Cambridge is the second-oldest university in the English-speaking world.
university.address: The Old Schools, Trinity Ln, Cambridge CB2 1TN, United Kingdom

university.name: Columbia University
university.about: Columbia University is a private Ivy League research university. Established in 1754 on the grounds of Trinity Church in Manhattan, Columbia is the oldest institution of higher education in New York and the fifth-oldest institution of higher learning in the United States.

university.name: University of California, Berkeley
university.about: The University of California, Berkeley is a public, land-grant research university. Established in 1868 as the state's first land-grant university, it was the first campus of the University of California ystem and a founding member of the Association of American Universities.

university.name: University of California,  San Diego
university.about: The University of California, San Diego is a public land-grant research university. Established in 1960. UC San Diego is ranked among the best universities in the world by major college and university rankings.
university.address: 9500 Gilman Dr, La Jolla, CA 92093, United States
